entries.english: Congratulations to Oussama for succesfully defending his Ph.D. thesis !
entries.french: Félicitations à Oussama pour avoir soutenu sa thèse avec brio !

entries.english: Our article "Modeling Techniques for the Formal Verification of Integrated Circuits at Transistor-Level: Performance vs. Precision Trade-offs" just got accepted for publication in IEEE TCAD journal.
entries.french: Notre papier "Modeling Techniques for the Formal Verification of Integrated Circuits at Transistor-Level: Performance vs Precision Trade-offs" vient d'être accepté pour publication dans le journal IEEE TCAD.

entries.english: Our paper "Communication and Shared Memory Efficient Mapping Techniques of Real-Time DAGs upon Clustered Multicore Platforms" just got accepted in RTNS 2025 (Pisa).
entries.french: Notre papier "Communication and Shared Memory Efficient Mapping Techniques of Real-Time DAGs upon Clustered Multicore Platforms" vient d'être accepté à RTNS 2025 (Pise).

entries.english: Our article "A Survey on Transistor-Level Electrical Rule Checking of Integrated Circuits" has been accepted for publication in ACM TODAES.
entries.french: Notre article "A Survey on Transistor-Level Electrical Rule Checking of Integrated Circuits" a été accepté pour publication dans le journal ACM TODAES.

entries.english: Our latest work "A Transistor Level Relational Semantics for Electrical Rule Checking by SMT Solving" has been accepted to DATE'24!
entries.french: Notre papier "A Transistor Level Relational Semantics for Electrical Rule Checking by SMT Solving" vient d'être accepté à DATE'24 !

entries.english: I have been appointed as Associate Professor at Verimag/UGA.
entries.french: Je suis désormais maître de conférences au laboratoire Verimag et à l'UFR IM²AG.
